content:
What are the ingredients required to make a pumpkin pie? Can you please provide the XML code for the ingredient list?
<ingredients>
  <ingredient>1 (9 inch) unbaked deep dish pie crust</ingredient>
  <ingredient>3/4 cup white sugar</ingredient>
  <ingredient>1 teaspoon ground cinnamon</ingredient>
  <ingredient>1/2 teaspoon salt</ingredient>
  <ingredient>1/2 teaspoon ground ginger</ingredient>
  <ingredient>1/4 teaspoon ground cloves</ingredient>
  <ingredient>2 eggs</ingredient>
  <ingredient>1 (15 ounce) can LIBBY'S® 100% Pure Pumpkin</ingredient>
  <ingredient>1 (12 fluid ounce) can NESTLE® CARNATION® Evaporated Milk</ingredient>
</ingredients>

Here's the XML code for the ingredient list of a pumpkin pie:

```xml
<ingredients>
  <ingredient>1 (9 inch) unbaked deep dish pie crust</ingredient>
  <ingredient>3/4 cup white sugar</ingredient>
  <ingredient>1 teaspoon ground cinnamon</ingredient>
  <ingredient>1/2 teaspoon salt</ingredient>
  <ingredient>1/2 teaspoon ground ginger</ingredient>
  <ingredient>1/4 teaspoon ground cloves</ingredient>
  <ingredient>2 eggs</ingredient>
  <ingredient>1 (15 ounce) can LIBBY'S® 100% Pure Pumpkin</ingredient>
  <ingredient>1 (12 fluid ounce) can NESTLE® CARNATION® Evaporated Milk</ingredient>
</ingredients>
```

This XML format outlines the ingredients needed for a classic pumpkin pie, making it easier to understand and organize.
